messages.title: Free Childcare And A Fairer Economy
messages.content: Families are working harder than ever, but far too many are struggling to get by. The Liberal Democrats have a bold plan to grow a brighter future. We want to create a fairer, more equal country so everyone can live a fulfilled, happy life. A Liberal Democrat government will provide free childcare for all children of working parents from 9 months old. We’ll close the gap between the rich and poor. The standard of free childcare provision will rise too, so that every child gets a fair chance in life. The Liberal Democrats will help everyone develop the skills needed to succeed throughout life.

messages.title: Transforming Mental Health Services
messages.content: The NHS may be the envy of the world, but our mental health service is not. People are currently waiting 14 weeks on average just for an assessment. In some parts of the country, it is over 6 months. The Liberal Democrats will transform our mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health. We will also improve access to training and increase staff numbers so that everyone who needs help can get it. We will provide extra funding so that children and young people, as well as adults, have access to good mental health support.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free Childcare And A Fairer Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide free childcare for all children of working parents from 9 months old. Close the gap between the rich and poor. Improve the standard of free childcare provision to give every child a fair chance in life.

Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health. Improve access to training and increase staff numbers. Provide extra funding for mental health support for children, young people, and adults.

issues.health: Transform mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health. Improve access to training and increase staff numbers. Provide extra funding for mental health support for children, young people, and adults.

community.content: Provide free childcare for all children of working parents from 9 months old.

endorsements.endorsement: I used to vote Conservative, now I'm voting Lib Dem. The nail in the coffin for me was when Boris Johnson was named leader of the Conservatives. His plans to take the party and the country backwards are shocking.

quotes.text: The Lib Dem fightback is real and it’s changing everything.
Boris Johnson really is the British Donald Trump.
Boris Johnson is a compulsive liar who has betrayed every single person he has ever had any dealings with.
Boris Johnson facing Lib Dems surge.
General election 2019 could deliver 'seismic changes', Swinson says.
